column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from July 7 through August 11, 2003.The minutes are attached.Attachment (67 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: September 25, 2003
